name: maps_get_directions
description: Get directions between two locations on Google Maps. Returns distance, duration, and step-by-step directions.

steps.code: const trips = document.querySelectorAll('#section-directions-trip-0, div[data-trip-index="0"], .directions-mode-group div[role="listitem"]'); const distanceEl = document.querySelector('.section-directions-trip-distance span, div[jstcache] .fontHeadlineSmall, div[data-trip-index="0"] .fontHeadlineSmall'); const durationEl = document.querySelector('.section-directions-trip-duration span, div[data-trip-index="0"] .fontHeadlineLarge, div.Fk3sm'); const steps = []; const stepEls = document.querySelectorAll('.directions-mode-step, div[data-step-index], .step-text'); stepEls.forEach((step, i) => { if (i >= 15) return; steps.push(step.textContent.trim()); }); return { distance: distanceEl ? distanceEl.textContent.trim() : '', duration: durationEl ? durationEl.textContent.trim() : '', steps: steps, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: directions
steps.label: Extract directions
